Warning: Chinese words separator extension takes about 15 seconds to process the text

Another warning: Addictive to learn from when used with HSK percentages of this page functionality of Chinese words separator

很好，谢谢。
Fine, thanks.

很高兴认识你。
It's nice meeting you.

你做什么工作？
What's your job?

你知道你在做什么吗？
What do you think you are doing?

你的衣服是什么颜色？
What color is your dress?

他在她的旁边。
He is beside her.

他不喜欢吃鱼。
He doesn't care for fish.

都是我的错。
It's all my fault.

你喜欢我就高兴。
I'm glad you enjoyed it.

他也学习汉语。
He studies Chinese as well.

你觉得怎么样？
What do you think of it?

你认为你能来吗？
Do you think you can come?

你记得她的名字吗？
Do you recollect her name?

我怎么知道。
How should I know.

妈妈准备了好吃的东西给我。
Mother has something delicious in store for me.

我看你不应该。
I don't think you ought to.

你应该去看医生。
You should see a doctor.

我去我叔叔家。
I am going to my uncle's.

我很愿意。谢谢你。
I do very much. Thank you.

你能告诉我去火车站最近的路吗？
Can you tell me the nearest way to the railway station?

我喜欢在图书馆学习。
I like to study in the library.

有的人爱先做难做的工作。
Some people tackle the difficult jobs first.

你明白了吗？
Do you understand?

我不太清楚。
I'm not really sure.

你会习惯的。
You'll get used to it.

她把我介绍给她的朋友。
She introduced me to her friend.

即使你不喜欢这工作，你也得做。
Even though you do not like it, you must do it.

我不明白你的意思。
I can't apprehend your meaning.

他是个有个性的人。
He is a man of individuality.

你以为你在跟谁说话？
Who do you think you're talking to?

他住在学校的宿舍里。
He hangs out in the school dormitory.

他昨天没打扫房间。
He didn't clean the room yesterday.

他昨天打扫房间吗？
Did he clean the room yesterday?

你赚了多少钱？
How much money did you make?

一切都会好的。
Everything will be OK.

我的狗不在旁边我就很寂寞。
I feel very lonely without my dog.

这方便得多了。
It's much more convenient.

是什么使他生病？
What caused his illness?

黑板在教室的前面。
The blackboard is in the front of the classroom.

他最喜欢吃的菜是烤鸭。
His favorite dish is roast duck.

他感冒了。
He caught a cold.

请帮我喂我的猫好吗？
Will you feed my cat for me?

你到底是怎么知道的？
How on earth did you know it?

你只要问他，他就会告诉你。
You have only to ask and he'll tell you.

我们都关心她的健康。
We are all concerned about her health.

他的破产和他的妻子很有关系。
His wife had much to do with his bankruptcy.

我爱她就像爱自己的女儿一样。
I have loved her like a father should.

我觉得这是我的义务。
I feel it is my duty.

你没拿我的眼镜吧？
Don't you have my glasses?

他喜欢拿他的同学开玩笑。
He likes playing jokes on his classmates.

排球是我很喜欢的运动。
Volleyball is a sport of which I am very fond.

他昨天参加了我们的讨论。
He joined us in the discussion yesterday.

我喜欢约翰，他是我非常要好的朋友。
I like John, a very good friend of mine.

她和我在学院里是同学。
She and I were contemporaries at college.

是的，肯定的。
Yes, definitely.

是的，当然可以。
Yes, certainly.

我不知道他的动力是什么。
I don't understand what his motive is.

我不知道他的意图是什么。
I do not know what his intention is.

你的约会怎么样？
How was your date?

我姐姐和我都喜欢穿牛仔裤。
Both my sister and I like to wear jeans.

我不喜欢我那单调乏味的工作。
I do not like my monotonous work.

我马上就来。
I'll be right with you.

这是他最不可能做的尝试。
This is the last attempt (that) he would make.

他是我认识的最可憎的人。
He is the most obnoxious man I know.

你干得很好。
You did a good job.

她的眼睛湿润了。
Her eyes moistened slightly.

你刚才指的是什么？
What were you alluding to just now?

他向他的朋友打招呼。
He saluted his friend.

他的意见没多少影响。
His opinion doesn't carry much weight.

即使下雨我们也要去。
We'll go even if it rains.

我想介绍我的地理老师给你认识，你现在是国会议员。
I'd like you to meet my geography professor. He's in the congress.

我不喜欢读他的文学批评。
I don't like to read his literary criticism.

看看你都做了些什么！
Just look at what you've done!

对不起，我忘了你的名字。
I'm sorry; I've forgotten your name.

中国历史上有多少个朝代？
How many dynasties are there in China's history?

这是我给你开的药方。
Here's my prescription.

他是个很难对付的人。
He was a difficult man to deal with.

这是本有教育意义的书。
This is an instructive book.

我怀疑，不，我肯定他错了。
I suspect, nay, I am certain, that he is wrong.

我们对我们的新老师很失望。
We are disappointed in our new teacher.

你看了关于选举的新闻了吗？
Have you read the news about the election?

这是我特意为你生日而做的。
I made this specially for your birthday.

只要你不出卖我，要我做什么我都愿意。
As long as you don't betray me, I'll do whatever you ask me to (do).

我可以向你保证，你儿子在这里会很快乐的。
I can assure you that your son will be happy here.

他走了，把所有没做完的工作都留给了我。
He was gone and left all the work undone to me.

他说他会来的，果然来了。
He said he would come, and sure enough he did.

你喜欢我的家常菜吗？
Did you enjoy my home cooking?

在来点马铃薯泥好吗？
Would you like more mashed potato?

我无论如何是会去的。
I will go whether or no.

他是个自私自利的人。
He is a lump of selfishness.

我没心情和你聊天。
I am in no mood for chatting with you.

我喜欢她眼睛的光彩。
I like the sparkles in her eyes.

他要我问候你。
He asked me to inquire after you.

我乐意和你去。
I am willing to go with you.

我确实得走了。
I really have to be going.

今天有多少学生缺席？
How many students are absent today?

想吃梨吗？
Would you like a pear?

好像要下雨了。
It looks as if it is going to rain.

我相信你是有见识的人。
I give you credit for more sense.

她坚决不来。
She was quite adamant that she would not come.

他昨天到达的。
He arrived yesterday.

你只要一看见她的脸就会明白，她是无辜的。
A glimpse of her face will tell you that she is innocent.

谁都不喜欢被人怠慢。
No one like to be treated with neglect.

我钱很宽裕，能帮助她。
As I had plenty of money I was able to help her.

她单独去是很危险的。
It's unsafe for her to go alone.

他姐姐过去一直指导他，给他出主意，是他的朋友。
His elder sister had been his guide, counsellor and friend.

他没注意到她的赞美。
He does not pay attention her praising.

我可以证明她是诚实的。
I can certify to her honesty.

老师对他的学生非常严格。
The teacher is very strict with his students.

你一定是在开玩笑吧。
You must be joking.

我不太明白，你能再解释一下吗？
I didn't quite follow; could you explain it again?

这对我太合适了。
Suits me fine.

再见了，很高兴见到你。
Good-bye. Nice seeing you.

他哄她同意带她去看电影。
He coaxed her into letting him take her to the cinema.

她和他的感受相同。
She felt just the same as he did.

你愿意当你弟弟的保证人吗？
Are you willing to stand surety for your brother?

那可简化了我的工作。
That will simplify my task.

他告诉我的消息是真实的。
The news he told me is truthful.

请把菜单给我。
Please show me the menu.

我们试图让她和她的家庭和好。
We tried to reconcile her with her family.

你周末计划做什么？
What are your plans for the weekend?

如果天气好，当然可以。
Certainly, if the weather is fine.

她的故事使我很感动。
I was very moved by her story.

我不知道他是否愿意来。
I don't know whether he is willing to come.

要是我知道他的地址就好了。
I wish I knew his address.

他在面条里放了些醋。
He put some vinegar in the noodles.

她在铝锅里下了些面条。
She put some noodles in the aluminum saucepan.

只要我身体好一定来。
I will come provided that I am well enough.

医生一会儿就到。
The doctor will be here presently.

他总是称赞他的女儿。
He always speaks well of his daughter.

我记得很清楚。
I remember quite clearly.

你愿意帮忙吗？
Are you willing to help?

这杯子碎了。
The glass shattered.

他的工作是做国内贸易。
He worked in internal trade.

欢迎你随时到我们家。
You are always welcome to our house.

他的工作符合了我们的期望。
His work comes up to what we expect of him.

我正准备打电话给你。
I was just about to call you.

让我为你的健康干杯。
Let me drink to your health.

如果你努力工作，你就会成功。
If you work hard you will succeed.

这需要时间。
It takes time.

她穿上袜子。
She draws on her socks.

我喜欢他的写作风格，但是不喜欢他的内容。
I like the style of his writing but I don't like the content.

自从我们在学校认识之后，我们就一直是好朋友。
We've been friends ever since we met at school.

我的朋友告诉我她住的地方文化生活贫乏。
My friend told me that the place she live is a cultural wasteland.

我清楚地告诉他，我拒绝了他的建议。
I made it clear to him that I rejected his proposal.

因为天气热，她穿了一件凉快的衣服。
As it was a hot day she wore a cool dress.

我虽然很喜欢她，却不打算娶她。
Much as I like her, I won't marry her.

我证明他已经收到了你的钱。
I certify that he has received your money.

你能告诉我你一个月赚多少吗？
Can you tell me how much you earn a month?

我过去相信你是有见识的人。
I gave you credit for more sense.

在我苦恼的时候，她来安慰我。
She comforted me in my distress.

我有了新工作和一班新同事。
I got a new job and a new set of work associations.

因为现在是收获期，所以我们都非常忙。
We are all very busy because it's the harvest time.

简单朴素的衣服适合在学校里穿。
Plain, simple clothes are appropriate for school wear.

啊，我真喜欢这首歌！好高兴！
Ah, I really love this song! I am so glad!

我就他的小说向他提问。
I plied him with questions about his novel.

他是个和蔼而快乐的人。
He is a friendly jovial fellow.

他是世界上最富有的人。
He is the richest man in the world.

我特地为你做了个蛋糕。
I made a cake specially for you.

他的失败是再明白不过了。
His failure is as plain as plain can be.

一般人都相信努力是值得的。
It is generally believed that it pays to work hard.

她在医院里接受了全面检查。
She underwent a thorough examination at the hospital.

那册书还能买到吗？
Is that volume still in print?

我已经写了三个小时了。
I've been writing for three hours.

我的钟一定是坏了。
There must be something wrong with my clock.

这只杯子是不锈钢做的。
This cup is made of stainless steel.

他的盘子里盛满了米饭。
His plate was piled high with rice.

我不喜欢它因为很吵闹。
I didn't like it because it was noisy.

这完全是你力所能及的工作。
This is a task well within your ability.

我们在那儿几乎没看见学生。
We saw few students there.

他的级别比我高。
He is above me in rank.

他的物理学得很好。
He does well in physics.

她喜欢和我一起溜冰。
She likes to ice-skate with me.

我不喜欢喝速溶咖啡。
I don't like to drink instant coffee.

他一再说他很忙。
He repeated several times that he was busy.

她是个真正的专家。
She is a real professional.

这是个棘手的问题。
It's a thorny subject.

我的钢笔是新的。
My pen is new.

他的痛苦现在已经过去。
His pain is past now.

这是个神奇的故事。
It's a magical story.

我不理解她的逻辑。
I didn't follow her logic.

他写的论文很优秀。
The treatise he wrote is excellent.

他和他哥哥一样英俊。
He is as handsome as his brother (is).

是的，这事我知道，谢谢。
Yes, I know that, thanks.

我是今天早晨从报纸上知道这条消息的。
I learned this piece of news from the newspaper this morning.

你的生活目标是什么？
What is your aim in life?

我有一大堆工作要做。
I have a mountain of work to do.

劳驾，能让我过去吗？
Excuse me, can I get past, please?

别慌忙，时间多的是。
Don't rush; there is plenty of time.

我们都相信她的预言。
We all believed in her prediction.

我讨厌他在教室抽烟。
I got sick of his smoking in the classroom.

气候影响了他的健康。
The climate affected his health.

我们可以轻松地开始工作。
We can set to work with a light heart.

我们刚才看见的那位同志是你的老师吗？
Be the comrade whom we see just now your teacher?

问题是什么时候能得到我们所需要的钱。
The problem is when to get the money we need.

他的书对这一问题的论述是最好的，仅次于我的书。
His book is the best on the subject after mine.

她和他订婚了。
She plighted herself to him.

这是谁的钢笔？
Whose pen is this?

我不太喜欢下棋。
I'm not very fond of playing chess.

他是个小机灵鬼。
He is a smart boy.

我觉得我很空虚。
I feel I am in emptiness.

他的衣服破烂不堪了。
His clothes were torn to rags.

我妈妈是个家庭妇女。
My mother is a housewife.

我喜欢你的幽默感。
I like your sense of humor.

她喜欢随着音乐跳舞。
She loves to dance to music.

听说你的猫死了，我觉得很难过。
I was sorry to hear that your cat had died.

难怪她病了，她几乎什么都没吃。
No wonder she's ill. She eats next to nothing.

你妈妈是个乐呵呵的容易相处的人。
Your mother is a jolly, easy-going woman.

我相信他是个我们应当尊敬的人。
He is a man whom I believe we should respect.

我肯定你有能力。
I've no doubt of your ability.

他跳上了桌子。
He jumped onto the table.

我必须告诉你，他的耐心是有限的。
I must tell you that his patience has its limit.

我们大家都认为考试作弊是不对的。
We all consider it wrong to cheat in examinations.

我们决定立刻去火车站。
We determined to go to the railway station at once.

你能告诉我是谁发明了电话？
Can you tell me who invented the telephone?

他没有给我回答他问题的机会。
He gave me no chance to reply to his question.

这本书是我特意为你买的。
I bought the book especially for you.

我很不喜欢住在闭塞的乡村。
I hate being shut away in the country.

我相信礼貌对大家是很重要的。
It is my belief that good manners are very important to everybody.

我们得给我们的新房子买些家具。
We will buy some furniture for our new house.

他长大了，穿剩下的衣服就给了他的弟弟。
As he grew up he passed on his clothes to his younger brother.

如果我后悔什么事情，那很可能是我的良好品行。
If I repent of anything, it is very likely to be my good behaviour.

我不喜欢吃菠菜，虽然我知道它对我有好处。
I don't like spinach even though I know it's good for me.

我今天提早工作都做完了，但是别人都还在工作，我不好意思回家。
I have gotten my work all done ahead of time today, but I'd feel guilty going home while everybody else is still work.

他的想法和我的不一致。
His ideas do not conform to mine.

他能跑得和我一样快。
He can run as fast as I can.

他向我告别。
He has taken leave of me.

可能的话，她想跟我们一起去。
If possible, She wants to go with us.

我非常想念你。
I miss you very much.

水的密度是1。
The density of water is 1.

没人理睬他。
Nobody speaks to him.

我在街道对面的连锁商店里买了这只面包。
I bought this loaf of bread in the chain store opposite the street.

你应该可怜他。
You should take pity on him.

我不喜欢孤独。
I am not fond of solitude.

既然你喜欢我的连衣裙而我也喜欢你的，咱们交换好吗？
As you like my dress and I like yours, shall we do a swap?

请你为我翻译一下好吗？
Would you please interpret for me?

她的热心感动了所有的人。
Her eagerness moved all the people.

她不应该把我的信公开。
She should not give publicity to my letter.

你知道是谁发明的指南针吗？
Do you know who invents the compass?

我和她商量过我的报告。
I consulted with her about my report.

他不提他曾经和她见面。
He made no mention of having met her.

别让我失望。
Don't let me down.

真让我失望。
I'm very disappointed.

他的痛苦引起了我们的同情。
His sufferings aroused our sympathy.

我还认识到了集体的力量。
I also learned the strength of the collective.

她用蔑视的态度和我们说话。
She talked to us with a defiant manner.

我感觉不舒服。
I'm not feeling well.

他在食槽里放了些草。
He put some grass in the manger.

我们的经理对我们要求很严格。
Our manager is very strict with us.

我不会把我的钱投资到他的公司。
I won't invest my money in his company.

我可以从她的眼睛里看出她的喜悦。
I can see her gladness in her eyes.

她所有的钱都投放到股票里去了。
She's got all her money in stocks and shares.

我想请你下星期日去参加舞会好吗？
I would like to invite you to a ball next Sunday.

我只关心我觉得对我很重要的事物。
I am concerned only with things that I feel are important to me.

我女儿喜欢给我讲她那些奇怪的梦。
My daughter likes to describe her fantastic dreams to me.

请把账单给我好吗？
Could I have the bill, please?

他解除了和她的婚姻。
He obtained the dissolution of his marriage with her.

秋季是我最喜欢的季节。
Autumn is my favourite season.

刚才你男朋友给你打电话了。
Your boyfriend called you just now.

一小时之内我就会到。
I'll be coming within an hour.

她讲了她的冒险经历。
She recounted her adventures.

你完全误解了我的意思。
You mistook my meaning entirely.

她委托邻居照顾她的孩子。
She resigned her children to the care of a neighbor.

那就说明了她不在这里的原因。
That explains why she is not here.

我津津有味地品尝了我妈妈做的鱼。
I tasted the fish my mother cooked with relish.

我们给她些压力她就会讲出来。
She'll sing if we put the pressure on.

我三番五次请她来，她都断然拒绝了。
I asked her several times to come but she categorically refused.

他的钱是我的三倍还不止。
He has more than three times my money.

再给你倒杯茶好吗？
Can I pour you another cup of tea?

我确信你是对的。
I'm sure you're right.

让她走，别阻拦她。
Let her go. Don't stop her.

这是他的亲笔画。
This is a picture of his own painting.

我亲眼看见他拿了钱。
I personally see him taking money.

要我承认错了，是很费力的。
It was painful to admit that I was wrong.

我想帮忙你捆扎东西。
I would like to help you pack.

我原谅了他的过失。
I looked over his faults.

太糟糕了。
That's too bad.

你知道怎么挤牛奶吗？
Do you know how to milk a cow?

我喜欢滑冰。
I like skating.

我对他很生气，因为他让我等了好久。
I was angry with him for keeping me waiting.

我妈妈鼓励我，而且坚持我应该继续我的教育。
My mother encouraged me and insisted that I continue my education.

他将他的名字写在清单上。
He wrote down his name on the list.

我希望他别再招待他的朋友了。
I wish he would desist from entertaining his friends.

我最喜欢吃桔子，其次才是香蕉。
Next to orange I like banana best.

不休息我们就走不动了。
We can't go any farther without a rest.

他的粗鲁让我生气。
His rudeness made me really angry.

他身体在逐步好起来。
He is getting better by degrees.

现在请注意它的商标。
Now pay attention its brand please.

我们喜欢看海豚的表演。
We like to see the performance of dolphins.

如果我需要你来帮忙，我会打电话的。
If I need you to come and help I'll call.

她对新环境不习惯。
She is not used to the new environment.

他说话谨慎。
He is careful in his speech.

全部艰苦的工作都是我做的，但是我的老板却宣布那是他自己的发现，窃取了我的发明创造。
I did all the hard work but my boss stole my thunder by announcing the discovery as his own

那把椅子原本是为你准备的，但是被她拿走了。
The chair was intended for you, but she took it away.

这只猫毛很光滑，看来喂得很好。
The cat looked very sleek and well fed.

这是我买过的最奢侈的东西.
It was the most extravagant purchase I have ever made.

我给他这一机会，他立刻抓住不放。
When I gave him the chance, he grabbed it at once.

How else can I apologize for her?

I can't sing now, but I could when I was young.

I failed to note that he had left.

我一觉醒来，发现我所有的衣服不翼而飞。
I awoke from sleep to find that all my clothes had disappeared.

你相信有仙女吗？
Do you believe in fairies?

我相信他的誓言。
I believe his troth.

He paid for it out of his own pocket.

说不定他已经死了。
He may be dead for aught I know.

He is in the habit of rising early.

他的职业是经商。
He is a merchant in occupation.

He has so few friends that his life is lonely.

I don't think much of the movie.

我通常大概7点起床。
I used to get up at about seven.

I especially dislike onions.

他得到越多，想要的也越多。

步行了四个小时以后，我们开始累了。
After walking for four hours we were beginning to flag.

我们很遗憾无法再考虑你的情况。
We regret that we are unable to reconsider your case.

我不打算放弃我的假日来迁就你, 你不听也得听!
I'm not giving up my holiday to suit you, so you can put that in your pipe and smoke it!

请你拼一下你的姓好吗?
Would you please spell your last name?

楼上的房间要比底层的暖和得多。
The upstairs rooms are much warmer than those on the ground floor.

我去睡觉，茶沏好后告诉我一声。
I'm going to sleep, tip me the wink when tea's ready.

她终于嫁给了最执着追求她的人。
She eventually married the most persistent one of her admirers.

她的小说描写的是伦敦现代的生活。
Her novel depicts life in modern London.

他真有胆量，穿着那身衣服去工作。
He's got a nerve, going to work dressed like that.

我知道你不喜欢他，但你至少要照顾一下面子去参加他公司的开典仪式。
I know you didn't like him, but at least have the decency to go to his opening ceremony of the company.

还好。顺便问一下，你母亲怎么样？她好吗？
Not bad. By the way, how is your mother? Is she all right?

就我而言，我并不反对你的计划。
As far as I am concerned, I'm not against your plan.

唉，我看什么都不如偶尔受点挫折更能使你明白你是多么的幸运了。
Ah well, I suppose there's nothing like an occasional setback to make you realize how lucky you really are.

这两间大教室已经分配给我们了.
The two large classrooms have been assigned to us.

青春期对人的性格形成是非常重要的。
The period of adolescence is very important in forming one's character.

我的护照再过两个月就到期了。
My passport is due to expire in two months.

在有关钱的问题上，我总是尽量小心谨慎。
Where money is concerned, I always try to be very careful.

你被蚊子咬的地方还在痒吗？
Are your mosquito bites still itching?

他和妻子吵架後就把她抛弃了。
He had a row with his wife and just walked out on her.

在一些问题上，他仍然保留自己的意见。
He still reserved his opinion on some points.

他总是把时间花在毫无意义的事上。
He always spend his time to no purpose.

她的钱被一个奸诈的会计骗去了。
She was defrauded of her money by a dishonest accountant.

困扰我的不是他的工作，而是他的态度。
It's not his work that bothers me; it's his attitude.

他连忙接受了我提供的东西或办法等。
He snapped at the offer I made him.

不应该让退休的人感到自己是个闲人
A retired person should not be made to feel he's on the shelf.

你应很好利用宝贵的每一分钟去学习。
You should make good use of every precious minute to study.

因为尺子被书盖住了，所以我没找到它。
I could not find my ruler because it was covered up by the books.

这三个人根据各自的能力被分配了工作。
The three men were given work according to their respective abilities.

她是个很好的妇人，冷酷不是她的本性。
She's a very good woman; unkindness is foreign to her nature.

我送给玛丽一个苹果换我最喜欢吃的香蕉。
I gave Mary an apple in exchange for my favorite banana.

我们用他给我们带来的面粉做了一些面包。
We made some bread with the flour he bought for us.

我可以在我的寓所里为你提供一个床位。
I'll fit you up with a bed at my flat.

婴儿把吃进去的东西吐在桌子上了.
The baby spat its food (out) onto the table.

我不知道这件衣服的价钱，它的标签掉了。
I don't know the price of the dress; its ticket has fallen off.

如果阁下愿意给我时间，我就能拿出证据来。
If your Lordship will give me time, I will produce the evidence.

他擦去试卷上的铅笔笔迹然后递给了老师。
He erased pencil marks form the test paper and handed to the teacher.

有命令要我们必须在一小时内挖好战壕。
Orders came that we should spade the trench in an hour.

我的部分工作是同我们的供应商保持良好的关系。
Part of my job is to maintain good relationship with our suppliers.

你撞到了我的手肘，弄坏了我正在画的图画。
You jogged my elbow and spoiled what I was drawing.

It's next to impossible to catch a taxi at night during the year- end party season.

Her face lit up when she saw he was coming.

这个证据证实了我认为他是间谍的这一看法。
This evidence reinforces my view that he is a spy.

我必须找一个人，在我离开期间代理我的职务。
I must find someone to act as a deputy for me during my absence.

他急切地取食物，因为从黎明开始，他一直没吃东西。
He took the food eagerly, for he had eaten nothing since dawn.

他总是用这样得方式说话，所以每个人都讨厌他。
He always talks in such a way that everyone dislikes him.

当知道他有许多敌人时，他开始担心他的性命。
Knowing he had many enemies, he went about in fear of his life.

我很匆忙, 所以随便地把衣服穿上了。
I was in such a hurry that I put my clothes on anyhow.

真不幸，上午我的自行车丢了，下午钱包又被偷了！
It's luckless, I lost my bicycle in the morning and my wallet was stolen in the afternoon!

Her greater experience tipped the balance in her favour and she got the job.

他的许多困难都是因为他的知识的贫乏而产生的。
His difficulties issue from his lack of knowledge.

记住，你现在当家作主了，要大胆说话，有什么想法就告诉我们。
Remember you are one of the masters now, so speak up and tell us what you think.

我们来抛硬币决定谁先走吧，你是要正面还是要反面？
Let's flip a coin to decide who should go first - do you want heads or tails?

她是个好演员，但仍需要时间去熟悉她要扮演的角色。
She is a good actress, but still needs time to grow into the part she is playing.

我们还以为那是最坏的情况呢，可没想到更糟的还在后面。
We thought that the situation was as bad as it could be, but worse was to follow.

He took over the post in the knowledge that it might endanger his life.

即使这工作要花掉我六个星期的时间，我仍决心要把它完成。
Even if it will take me six weeks, I am determined to finish the job.

他在他们的眼光里是坍台了；他在贫民前面丢了体面和地位。
He was degraded in their eyes; he had lost caste and station before the very paupers.

如果我是你，我现在就不会进去找他。他这会儿心情不好，见谁骂谁，看什么都不顺眼。
I shouldn't go in and see him now if I were you. He's having one of his bad days, swearing at everything and everyone.

他的外套和裤子不相配。
His coat is not in keeping with the trousers.

我到那里去理发。
I go there for a haircut.

他的英语有进步。
He is forward in his English.

你应该经常清理房间。
You should always clean up the room.

你说的有几分是真实的。
What you say is partly true.

她一直想成名。
She has always been desirous of fame.

请跟我说实话。

The cake bulked up.

The church is close to the school.

他有音乐天赋。
He has a gift for music.

她除了他以外没有好朋友。

Her white face and her dark dress contrast sharply.

我和她长谈了一次。
I had a long talk with her.

那边的那个人是谁？
Who is that over there?

你太过分了！
You've gone too far!

他为什么到那里去，这对我来说是个谜。

那是我听到的最愚蠢的事！

我的背疼得要命。

总的来说，我很喜欢这本书。

天气很冷，不是吗?

One that fidgets.

The average of 4, 6 and 8 is 6.

He's given to boasting.

He kicked the ball to the stand.

She enjoys all kinds of music, as I do.

You eat too much starch.

The warm weather tempted us into going for a swim.

问问他是否能来。

The fine weather is bringing the crops on nicely.

He moved the table over to the center of the room.

I know her face but I can't call her name to mind.

他的意见和我的意见没多大差异。
His opinion doesn't differ much from mine.

He worked out an excellent idea.

他的行为没达到公认的标准。
His behaviour falls short of accepted standards.

我希望我的告诫会促使她作出更大的努力。
I hoped my warning would stimulate her to greater efforts.

我过去和他合伙经商。
I associated with him in business.

难懂的不容易理解的；深奥的
Not easily understood; abstruse.

她母亲去世对她是个沉重的打击。
It was a great blow to her when her mother died.

请向您母亲转达我的祝愿。
Please convey my good wishes to your mother.

他是个笨拙的孩子，经常笨手笨脚地把东西摔破。
He was an awkward child, always falling over himself and breaking things.

我不知道确切的日子。
I don't know the exact date.

去年癌症夺走了他姐姐的生命。
Cancer carried his sister off last year.

寒冷的天气终于在三月末结束了。
The cold weather at last broke at the end of March.

他该保持安静是有必要的。
It is important that he be quiet.

我女朋友唠叨着要我去理发，因此我今天终于去理了。只要能保持安宁，那还是值得的。
My girlfriend keeps on nagging me to get a haircut so I finally had one today; it was worth it if only to keep the peace.

见面时，他拥抱了她。
He enfolded her when they met.

看见他的健康情况这样不佳，我很伤心。
It grieves me to see him in such bad health.

Who discovered the conservation of energy?

His hasty temper made him offensive.

I was deeply moved by her earnestness.

After these dry days, everyone hopes for rain.

Ask the doctor to prescribe something for that cough.

It is boring to listen to the same story.

The mirror is oval.

He has an extensive vocabulary.

He didn't relish the prospect of having to explain his behavior.

His repression broke out.

他居然有脸要求赔偿。
He had the gall to sue for damages.

I have no doubt that you will succeed.

Your contract has been terminated.

Fair weather was the rule yesterday.

你要是不在，这世界不知将有多寂寞！
What a lonely world it would be with you away!

He first poured some water in the basin.

He insisted that our inference was all wet.

我希望这些安排会得到你的同意。

My daughter screamed when she saw a slug.

His costly mistake resulted in severe loss.

这个学生敏捷的回答得到了老师的表扬。
The student's speedy answers were praised by the teacher.

The travel company's failure bust up my holiday.

In times of difficulty, she pray for an oracle to guide her

他看到她父亲走进来就站了起来。
He got to his feet when he saw her father came in.

工作了十五个小时之后，我开始感到累了。
After working for fifteen hours I began to tire.

她很高兴地听着窗外鸟儿的鸣叫声。
She was delighted to hear the twitter of the birds somewhere near her window.

我把一切东西都锁在保险箱里以防万一。
I took the precaution of locking everything in the safe.

她在新衣服上戴了一枚钻石别针。
She wore a diamond clip on her new dress.

His discoveries have put a new face on our scientific knowledge.

我仍然弄不清楚你所强调的要点。
I still don't see the point you emphasized.

All the participants in the debate had an opportunity to speak.

The heater in my car doesn't work properly.

His wife's death left him a vacuum in his life.

我们能做什么来防止这种疾病蔓延呢？
What can we do to prevent the disease spreading?

The present crisis is more than any that have gone before.

这幅画上你画的猪鼻子太长了。
The snout of the pig you drew on the picture is too long.

你还记得我们解剖青蛙的那堂课吗？
Do you remember the lesson on the anatomy of a frog?

雪崩发生的时候我们的处境多么危险啊！
What a precarious situation we were in when the avalanche started!

成功的滋味能让人对之形成习惯
The taste of success may become habit-forming.

She took me on as her personal assistant but all I seem to do is fetch and carry for her.

我找不到你寄给我的那封信。
I can't trace that letter you sent me.

哟，大人，你想找我茬，是吗？

He is writing a sequel to his latest best seller.

He carved me some very nice pieces of chicken.

My hometown is in the upper reaches of the river.

Would you by any chance have change for 5?

His writing has improved greatly in this semester.

I don't feel at ease in the strange place.

I went to the place in conformity with your instructions.

你或许能帮我—个忙吧?

The rows of houses were uniform in appearance.

我认为我和我女儿之间没有隔阂。

She was unlucky to catch a cold on the first day of her holiday.

这孩子已经喝了三盘粥了!
The child has eaten three platefuls of porridge!

I always tell my daughter a story before she goes to sleep.

The point is there is a difference between an interest and a skill.

我们都去飞机场为她送行了.
We all went to the airport to see her off.

Nothing ever happens in this town.

I've passed the intermediate level exam of Japanese.

You may hang your coat on the hook.

His death was caused by a high fever.

He is wedded to his own opinion and nothing can change him.

The dog is rushing at him.

I thought it might be true.

We've grown many vegetables in our garden.

This medicine will do you good.

医生对我说，我需要好好休息。
The doctor told me I was in need of a good rest.

My brother is a cattle breeder.

我安置孩子们去睡觉了.
I've put the children to bed.

我的朋友都是男生，他们一点也不关心读书。
My friends were all boys who cared nothing about studying.

Marked by refinement in taste and manners; cultured; polished.

这本书很有趣。
This book is interesting.

I cannot but pity him.

Would you please lend me your pencil?

His large key had poked a hole in his pocket.

You can take your time to pay the debt you owe me.

The apartment was originally meant for five.

这段文字可以有不同的解释。

He came up (to me) and asked the time.

The company now uses a computer to do all its account.

We saw him watering the lawn around the house.

我在黑暗的房间里摸索着找电灯开关。
I groped for the light switch in the dark room.

并非所有的人生来都像你这样有天赋。
Not everyone was born with such endowments as you.

他向我请教那件事以表示对我的敬意。
He paid me the compliment of consulting me about the affair.

再来一轴线我就可以完成这幅刺绣了。
I need one more spool of thread before finishing the embroidery.

谁那麽讨厌把我的毛巾拿走了.
Some so-and-so has pinched my towel.

别担心，已经有人告诉了我他们所有的鬼把戏。
Don't worry. I've been put up to all their tricks.

他吩咐他到外面跑跑去寻找新的顾客。
He tells him to go out and find new customer.

她对这一危机的处理使我赞叹不已.
Her handling of the crisis fills me with admiration.

在日本，棒球比其他任何运动都受人欢迎。
Baseball is more popular than any other sport in Japan.

圣诞节是个快乐的日子，尤其是对孩子们。
Christmas is a time of mirth, especially for children.

电影一开演我就知道不会喜欢这部电影.
I knew early on (in the film) that I wasn't going to enjoy it.

He scratched his name on the wall with a knife.

他吓得直哆嗦，就好像看见了鬼一样。
He was shaking with fright as if he had seen a ghost.

He adjusted himself very quickly to the heat of the country.

这只老虎拖着它的猎物进了丛林。
The tiger dragged its kill into the jungle.

无限的耐心使她成为这个医院最好的护士。
Her endless patience made her the best nurse in the hospital.

Cats are warm and affectionate creatures to us, but viewed through the eyes of birds and mice they are vicious predators.

The man was sent to the hospital for having eaten toadstool by mistake.

Be there as many machine tools in our workshop as in theirs?

His isolation has made him blunt about the feelings of others.

Our eyes slowly adapted to the dark.

He showed remarkable endurance throughout his illness.

财务上出现问题延误了我们的建设计画。

绅士可能有钱、或者可能依赖朋友过活；绅士的准则是，无论他怎么穷也罢，他依然是拒绝做任何有用的工作的。
A gentleman may have money or may sponge on his friends; the criterion of a gentleman is that however poor he may be he still refuses to do useful work.

Please find me a receptacle for sugar.

很遗憾，你没有得到那份工作。
I'm sorry that you didn't get the job.

I felt I hadn't been treated fairly.

She was playing with her handkerchief all the while during the speech.

我恳求你饶了他吧.

He chose Germany, but personally I'd prefer to go to Spain.

看起来他似乎很喜欢大城市的热闹繁忙的生活。
It seems that he enjoys the hustle and bustle of life in the big city.

任何人对她报道的饥荒情况都不可能无动于衷。
It's impossible to remain unmoved by her reports of the famine.

I hope you'll never change back from the person you have recently become.

Each side of a case in court has its own counsel.

The old gentleman likes to put grease on his hair to make it shiny.

I don't know the words of the song but I can hum it to you.

He is a patient man, but not even he could sit down under that kind of provocation.

I gave him full directions to enable him to find the house.

He knocked off two chops and a plateful of vegetables in about ten minutes, and then asked for more.

His career have come full circle to the club where it begin.

He enrolled with an employment agency for a secretary.

There are many lights and electrical instruments on the computer console.

我们点燃了蜡烛，蜡烛照亮了房间。
We lit the candle and the candle lit the room.

似乎什么事也没发生过似的。
It seems as if he had been working for hours.

My mother was wrathful with my lying.

Points of policy are decided ad hoc.

The prospect of promotion was dangled before him.

The mayor dedicated the World Fair yesterday.

It seems uncertain why he lost the election.

Her political activities brought her into collision with the law.

He laid his opponent low with a single punch.

She embroidered the cushion with flowers.

She is sweeping the soot off the chimney.

Interest lags in such matters.

I've got a tame mechanic who keeps my car in order.

请为我预定一个座位。
Please reserve a seat for me.

祝你一路平安。
I wish you a good journey.

城市之外的一个小地方
A little place outside the city.

每一种规则都有例外。
There is no rule but has exceptions. (=There is no rule that doesn't have exceptions.)

In this country New Year's Day is a national holiday.

他把地图平铺在地上。
He spread the map flat out on the floor.

他的脚上扎了一些碎玻璃屑。
Some splinters of glass had got into his feet.

I wish you a happy birthday.

May you have a fine trip.

A pleasant journey to you!

它不是手表。
It is not a watch.

The child will be six.

The meeting may be prolonged into the evening because so many problems have to be solved tonight.

已经出现了一些问题.
A number of (ie some) problems have arisen.

One of his less attractive traits is criticizing his wife in public.

There is an interesting article in this weekly.

The novelty of his surroundings soon wore off.

He experienced great difficulty in getting a visa to leave the country.

The horse sensed danger and stopped.

I wish you a pleasant trip.

过去的已经过去，且一去不返，而聪明人总是努力着眼于现在和将来的事情，所以对过去耿耿于怀着无非是在捉弄自己罢了。

The case for choice is appealing: by allowing parents to send their children to any school in any neighborhood, underachieving schools will be forced to shape up.

The steaming cake was a bait for the hungry boy.

I've had enough of your dramatics.

I hurried to the ticket-office.

我还在学习, 别指望我十全十美!
I'm still only a learner, so don't expect perfection!

你已经成年了, 这些问题要自己解决。
Since you are already of age now, you should solve the problems by yourself.

那所房子是出卖的，房子里有暖气设备。
That house is for sale. It has central heating.

她有财富便於她在社会各界造成巨大影响。
Her wealth gives her enormous leverage in social circles.

如果你不积极进取，更加努力学习，你就会考不及格的。
If you don't get on the ball and start studying harder, you're going to flunk.

无论境遇好坏她的丈夫都对她忠贞不渝.
Her husband stuck by her in good times and bad.

我们永远都不应该忘记日本侵略者犯下的暴行。
We should never forget the outrage committed by the Japanese invaders.

我们的步兵和装甲兵均比敌军的少.
We have less infantry and armour than the enemy.

他对他扮演的角色理解得细微之至。
He understands his part to a miracle.

他说话说快了就爱喷唾沫星.
He's inclined to spit when he talks quickly.

我的一些朋友通过打网球锻炼他们胳膊的肌肉。
Some of my friends develop their arm muscles by playing tennis.

正因如此，今天从事写作的男女青年已经忘记了人类内心的冲突。而这本身就能就好作品。因为这是唯一值得写、值得呕心沥血地去写的题材。
Because of this, the young man or woman writing today has forgotten the problems of the human heart in conflict with itself, which alone can make good writing because only that is worth writing about, worth the agony and the sweat.

在法律上，你没有义务非回答这些问题不可。
You are not legally bound to answer these questions.

他一听到这个消息就果断地采取了行动。
He acted with decision as soon as he heard the news.

我们在高速公路上行驶时汽油用完了.
We ran out of juice on the motorway.

他的儿子已成长为一个健壮勤劳的小伙子。
His son has grown up into a sturdy hardworking young man.

让我们讨论一些咱们可以自由谈论的事吧。
Let us discuss such things as we can talk it freely.

最近的事态发展使我们受到很大的鼓舞.
We are much heartened by the latest developments.

Do you have any particular plan to help them to open up new market?

I could see that as of old their house was a port of call for all the lonely and the lost of the district.

我原以为发生的事是够糟的了，不料更糟的事还在后头。
I thought that what happened was bad enough, but worse was to follow.

迪克一开始舍不得花钱去看医生，如果，他的心脏病日趋严重。这真是贪小失大，得不偿失。
Dick's heart trouble became worse because he wouldn't spend money to see a doctor at the beginning; he was indeed penny wise and pound foolish.

A stranger with whom casual acquaintance is made, usually in anticipation of sexual relations.

That cheeky new secretary just pranced up to me and asked if I worked here!

他把空余时间都用在园艺上了, 没有任何其他爱好.
He spent his spare time gardening, to the exclusion of all other interests.

Society where each class or level have a duty to serve the class above it.

The book has a red wrapper.

Some beer and chocolate taste bitter.

That interview was an absolute libel on a honest man.

She sobbed out the story of the death of her child.

A teacher can't give individual attention to each pupil if his class is large.

He told me the whole story in spades and there's no doubt about it.

She wears a ring set with emeralds on her right hand.

Police sealed off all the exits from the building.

The girl is so shy that she colours up whenever a man speaks to her.

I want to have a cool drink.

He came out with his staple excuse that he was too busy.

The ground quaked under his feet.

我刚煮好咖啡--你能抽空儿喝点儿吗?
I've just made some coffee have you time for a quickie?

他们把自己的家变成了无家可归的孤儿们的避难所。
They have made their home a haven for the homeless orphans.

这张古董桌子卖给那位戴粉红色帽子的女士了.
The antique table went to the lady in the pink hat.

60岁以上的人的锻炼时间减低到每日十分钟.
The period of exercise was geared down to ten minutes a day for men over 60.

今年的春季会较往年来得晚，因为天气一直还这么冷。
Spring will be a backward season this year, for the weather has all along been so cold.

肥皂粉别用得太多, 这儿的水很软.
Don't use much soap powder the water here is very soft.

她在枪上留下的指纹就是她犯罪的确凿证据.
Her fingerprints on the gun were conclusive proof of her guilt.

经过这许多年月, 他的体力不如从前了.
His strength has diminished over the years.

变异的从标准变化来的，通常只是一些轻微的不同
Deviating from a standard, usually by only a slight difference.

The reactionary rulers found it very difficult to bring the oppressed natives under.

那间房子是出售的，房子里有暖气设备和地下室。
That house is for sale. It has central heating and a base room.

我已经计算出你应分摊的费用是10英镑.
I've worked out your share of the expenses at 10.

The carriages of the toy train lock onto the toy train with a special hook.

因为长时间的干旱，农民们对于好收成的前景是怀疑的。
Because of a long drought, the farmers are doubtful about the prospect of a good yield.

她最近的一部小说在出版当年就印行了三次.
Her last novel ran into three reprints in its first year of publication.

Is there no escape from the ubiquitous cigarette smoke in restaurants?

He renounced his religion and became a Muslim.

Many of the great movie stars of today were originally discovered by talent scouts.

Some people find retiring difficult, but he has taken it all in his stride.

We might have a free press, but that doesn't mean all reporting is true and accurate.

He used the occasion to express all his old grievances against the chairman.

Life is made up of sob, sniffle, and smile, with sniffle predominate.

The new road system permits the free flow of traffic at all times.

Our team won the toss so we play first.

Marked by deliberate obscurity of style or expression.

A woman joined to a man in marriage; a female spouse.

My wife, however, next morning, at parting, after I had gone some paces from the door, called me back, to advise me, in a whisper, to have all my eyes about me.

在大多数的主要交叉路口，都有一幅街道（朗巴德街、俄亥俄街、市场街等等）的详图刻在人行道的石头上。只要你低头看一下，就知道自己所在的位置了。
At most of the important crossings there is a plan of the streets(Lombard Street; Ohio Street; Market Street; and so on)cut into the stone of the sidewalk so that you can look down and see where you are.

她已经（向我）暗示说我得到了这个奖.
She has already hinted (to me) that I've won the prize.

It's impossible to cut a pineapple with such a dull knife.

He is the best one of those astronomers.

There was such a crush on the train that I could hardly breathe.

The young teacher had difficulty in holding the children under her girdle.

I think autumn is the most beautiful season in a year.

There was a power cut and all the lights went out.

A lot of people were queuing for the film.

He's very clever at imitating his friends.

Mr Smith is expert at a lot of things, but he always hides his light under a bushel.

Let's postpone making adecision until we have more information.

You must take the most scrupulous care to keep the wound free from the dirt.

We must get some method into our office filing.

She gets impatient with the old man being so slow and confused. She ought to remember that old age comes to us all.

He was walking to and fro swearing at the delay which was costing him so much money every minute.

His black leather couch looks expensive.

Such casual dress would not be correct for a formal occasion.

Good books are an enrichment of life.

A jeep is ideal for driving over rough terrain.

We dig some pits with a spade before planting the trees.

This species of flower flourishes in a warm climate.

They traveled to a village overshadowed by mountains.

I can't afford the upkeep of a large house and garden.

The doctor told me to cut out meat for my fat.

Clearly, AmEx will be a smaller company in the post-Robinson era. It is likely to sell its Shearson Lehman Brothers division, giving up dreams of becoming a""financial supermarket."" Company culture, too, may change, from an aristocratic and bureaucratic empire to a company that is more down to earth.

布尔代数中的一种运算，它同时对两个二进制数字进行如下操作：如果一个数或二个数为1，则结果为1；如果二个数均为零，则结果为零。它的逻辑算符是OR运算符。
An operation performed in Boolean algebra on two binary digits simultaneously in a way that the result is one if either one or both digits are a one, or zero if both digits are zero. The logic operator is the OR operator.

心理分析由西格蒙德·弗洛伊德创立的一套精神治疗的方法，用自由联系、对梦的阐释和对抵抗和移情的分析来研究被压抑或无意识的冲动、焦虑和内心冲突

One of the sudden or unexpected changes or shifts often encountered in one's life, activities, or surroundings.

The new laws empower the police to stop anybody in the street.

Except in the sonnets and poems, Shakespeare's formal sense is disguised and does not threaten. No matter how wrong this idea might be, it does give the poet bobbing in Shakespeare's wake the momentary illusion that he might be waving instead of drowning.

A system of physical conditioning designed to enhance circulatory and respiratory efficiency that involves vigorous, sustained exercise, such as jogging, swimming, or cycling, thereby improving the body's utilization of oxygen.

韦伯磁通量的国际单位，等于当磁通量在一秒钟内被统一地减弱为零时在它联接的一圈电路内产生一伏特电动势时的磁通量
The SI unit of magnetic flux equal to the magnetic flux that in linking a circuit of one turn produces in it an electromotive force of one volt as it is uniformly reduced to zero within one second.

The essential function or nature of a thing.

He's always careful to do things by the book.

Their nuptials were performed by the local priest.

A clever trick, method, or device, especially one that is new and different; an innovation.

A method of objecting that admits the facts of the opponent's argument but denies that they sustain the pleading based upon them.

The machine rests on a bed of concrete.

A meaningful linguistic unit consisting of a word, such as man, or a word element, such as-ed in walked, that cannot be divided into smaller meaningful parts.

痴愚者一个人智能迟缓发展，仅具有7岁到12岁的智能，一般在一定程度的学术或职业教育后能够进行交流和掌握社会技术。这个词是一个集合概念，现在不再使用，并被视为带有侮辱意味

Is a large head indicative of high intelligence?

Heavy rain came on the heels of the lightening.

He examined each piece of evidence in isolation.

我们出去吸口新鲜空气吧。
Let's go out for a breath of fresh air.

这种洗衣机是最新型产品。
This washing machine is the latest model.

A specially irrigated or flooded field where rice is grown.

她从容不迫地讲话.
She spoke with unruffled calm.

他把驾驶员当做人质。
He kept the pilot as a hostage.

A proper or assigned station or place, as for officers and crew on a warship.

We were rationed to two eggs a week.

我希望演说者不要离题。
I wish the speaker would confine himself to the subject.

The calendar now nearly keeps in step with the season, although there is still on error of26 season, per year

他托我照看一天孩子。
He's entrusted his children to my care for a day.

Gradually he sank into sleep.

Language teaching is both a science and art.

New York is a canton of America.

大多数手写体都向右斜。
Most handwriting slants to the right.

A red sunset signifies fine weather.

冬天是大多数旅馆的淡季。
Winter is the slack season at most hotels.

那只鹰向兔子猛扑下来。
The eagle dived down on the rabbit.

他专爱说人闲话.
He's a terrible gossip.

The scars on his body lent colour to his claim that he had been tortured.

The cat whined at the door, asking to be let out.

The town has altered out of all recognition since I was last here.

这条河从这里转向北方。
The river turns north at this point.

他再也抵抗不住了.
He could resist no longer.

She's due for promotion soon.

我用不著你来干涉!
I don't want any interference from you!

It is rare to find such a genius nowadays.

The clowns pulled funny faces.

It's cruel to make fun of a blind man.

They will go to Europe, won't they?

He was heard to groan.

The holiday-makers chartered a boat to go fishing.

A huge wave swept over the deck.

在源文件中，打印在相同栏内的若干正文行的集合。在当前栏内所剩余的纵向空间放不下既定一段正文时，则这段正文从下一栏开始打印［或印刷］。在单栏格式的情况下，下一栏便是下一页。
In a source document, a collection of lines of text to be printed in the same column. When the vertical space remaining in the current column is insufficient for the block of text, the text is printed in the next column. In the case of single-column format, the next column is on the next page.

沙漏；滴漏用于计时的仪器，由两个玻璃盒组成，中由一细颈相连，盒内装有一定量的沙子，水银或其他流动物质，这些物质在一固定量的时间里，通常为一个小时，从上方的盒内慢慢流入下方的盒子中
An instrument for measuring time, consisting of two glass chambers connected by a narrow neck and containing a quantity of sand, mercury, or another flowing substance that trickles from the upper chamber to the lower in a fixed amount of time, often one hour.

一种安全设备（通常是终端的一部分），它可以读取插入槽中的标记卡上的信息（这些信息往往以磁条码的形式记录在标记卡上）。用这种办法，在允许操作员进入系统前，可以防止对一个显示工作站的非法使用。参阅badge。
A security device(often part of a terminal) that reads information(often from a magnetic strip) on a badge inserted in a slot. In this way, it can prevent the unauthorized use of a display station before allowing an operator to sign on.

According to Newton's first law, a body at rest will remain at rest until a force is applied to it.

If air weren't admitted into the bell jar, the electric bell in the bell jar would not ring because of a lack of a medium.

The most perceptive of the three, she was the first to realize the potential danger of their situation.

我应该先审慎打探一下这家公司的底细, 然後您再签字.
I should make a few discreet enquires about the firm before you sign anything.

A sermon, especially one intended to edify a congregation on a practical matter and not intended to be a theological discourse.

Horace was relishing his power. He was the tough, the big shot, who gave orders with the crack of a whip.

`He exploded with rage' shows a figurative use of the verb `to explode'.

辐散，散度一种天气状况，特征为：在气团均匀地散在某一地区上空，常伴有晴朗干燥天气
A meteorological condition characterized by the uniform expansion in volume of a mass of air over a region, usually accompanied by fair dry weather.

成洞身体组织或器官内空洞的形成，尤指那种因肺结核而在肺中形成的空洞
The formation of cavities in a body tissue or an organ, especially those formed in the lung as a result of tuberculosis.

It's easier to be a Bernard Shaw to the British or American public than it is to be a Bernard Shaw to your own family.

As the air craft moves forward, the air flowing over the wings produces lift to raise the aircraft off the ground, and keep it in the air.

An early primer consisting of a single page protected by a transparent sheet of horn, formerly used in teaching children to read.

A neurotic disorder characterized by chronic fatigue and weakness, loss of memory, and generalized aches and pains. It was formerly thought to result from exhaustion of the nervous system.

Not stained strongly or definitely by either acid or basic dyes but stained readily by neutral dyes. Used especially of white blood cells.

工资问题可商议解决.
The salary is negotiable.

波浪冲击着岩石。
The waves are lashing against the rocks.

罪犯被判处死刑。
The criminal was sentenced to capital punishment.

确实非常感激您!
Thank you very much indeed!

我们即将动身.
We're about to start.

努力，尽力，出力
Exert oneself to do sth.

比赛因雨延期。
The game was put off because of rain.

So as to conform to a type, standard, or pattern.

We are scornful of the forces of convention.

我们通常赊销货物。
It is usual for us to sell on credit.

Congress makes the laws; the President executes them.

Exercise promotes health.

新制度何时生效？
When does the new system become effective?

Women demand equal pay for equal work.

The headmaster praised the boys for their neat turn-out.

The sheriff ordered the policemen to gather.

警察负责执法。
The police are responsible for the enforcement of the law.

吉隆坡马来西亚的首都和最大城市，位于马来半岛的西南部、新加坡西北。于1857年由锡矿工人建立，现为该国的商业和工业中心。人口937，817
The capital and largest city of Malaysia, on the southwest Malay Peninsula northwest of Singapore. Founded by tin miners in1857, it is the commercial and industrial hub of the country. Population, 937,817.

For analog inputs, any absolute voltage value above which the analog-to- digital converter cannot distinguish a change. The overload value can be different for plus and minus inputs.

The party then searched the whole cave thoroughly but did not find anything except an empty tin trunk.

A hypothetical particle postulated to be the quantum of gravitational interaction and presumed to have an indefinitely long lifetime, zero electric charge, and zero rest mass.

亟须找出解决方法, 这是鞭策他的动力.
The need to find a solution urged him on.

You didn't shut your eyes before you made the wish, so it doesn't count!

An indicator or a sighting apparatus on a plane table, used in angular measurement.

温彻斯特区英格兰中南部一自治区，位于伦敦西南。是盎格鲁－撒克逊时期西撒克斯王国的首府。在诺曼征服（1066年）以后，成为一个吸引了众多宗教学者的重要学术中心。人口32，100
A municipal borough of south-central England southwest of London. The capital of the Anglo-Saxon kingdom of Wessex, it was an important center of learning that attracted many religious scholars after the Norman Conquest(1066). Population, 32,100.

耳鸣一个耳朵或两耳中的声音，如嗡嗡声或哨声，在没有外界刺激的情况下发生，通常由某种特定情况如耳朵感染、使用某种药物、听觉管道堵塞或头部受伤引起
A sound in one ear or both ears, such as buzzing, ringing, or whistling, occurring without an external stimulus and usually caused by a specific condition, such as an ear infection, the use of certain drugs, a blocked auditory tube or canal, or a head injury.

在远程通信系统中，当报文发往的工作站处于不工作状态时控制站所采取的行动，即接收并存储该报文直到该工作站恢复工作时，再由控制站将报文送给它。在报文交换系统中，控制站可以是一台计算机。
In a remote communication system, the action taken by a control station whereby messages addressed to an inoperative station are accepted and stored at the control station until they can be sent to the destination station. The control station may be a computer in a message switching system.

The firework exploded with a loud bang.

Any of a group of colors reddish in hue, of medium to high lightness, and of low to moderate saturation.

A plant cultivated for an edible part, such as the root of the beet, the leaf of spinach, or the flower buds of broccoli or cauliflower.

定时器一种计时器，尤指控制时间间隔并指示间隔结束的那种计时器，如炉子上的计时器
A timepiece, especially one used for measuring and signaling the end of time intervals, as on a stove.

挛缩一种异常且常为永久性的缩短，如肌肉或瘢痕组织，会导致扭曲或变形，特别是身体关节处
An abnormal, often permanent shortening, as of muscle or scar tissue, that results in distortion or deformity, especially of a joint of the body.

An effect that occurs when a signal is sampled at a rate less than twice the highest frequency present in the signal.The subsequent signal recovered from the samples will not contain the high frequency component of the original signal and will display a false low frequency signal.

A temporary state of mental confusion and clouded consciousness resulting from high fever, intoxication, shock, or other causes. It is characterized by anxiety, disorientation, hallucinations, delusions, trembling, and incoherent speech.

犁一种农具，由在一根横梁端部的厚重的刃构成，通常系在一组牵引它的牲畜或机动车上，用来破碎土块并耕出槽沟从而为播种做好准备

There is a tutor to teach the children while they're in hospital.

黑曜岩火山玻璃，一般为黑色，带状，摔碎时色泽光亮，表面变曲，由火山熔岩迅速凝而成
A usually black or banded, hard volcanic glass that displays shiny, curved surfaces when fractured and is formed by rapid cooling of lava.

The thieves were caught in a police trap.

四个四分之一可构成一个整体.
Four quarters make a whole.

这场火把城市上空映得一片通红。
The fire cast a ruddy glow over the city.

那船逆著潮水缓慢地前进.
The boat made slow headway against the tide.

把这些乾豆子泡一夜.
Leave the dried beans to soak overnight.

那个嫌疑犯被带到警察局问话.
The suspect was taken to the police station for questioning.

把黄油加热，直到变成褐色为止。
Heat the butter until it browns.

一辆机车沿着铁道隆隆地驶去。
A locomotive pounded down the railway track.

这些计划终於得以实施.
The plans were finally put into execution.

这一税收制度一旦施行，必定会危害国民经济。
This tax can not be introduced without detriment to the economy.

一切生物均可按等级分类.
There is a hierarchy in the classification of all living creatures.

那场旱灾过後疾病丛生.
Outbreaks of disease occurred in the wake of the drought.

战胜国要求战败国交付巨额赔款.
The victorious nations are demanding huge indemnities from their former enemies.

手泵式四轮小车由一个小马达或一台手泵驱动的小型无篷路轨车
A small open railroad car propelled by a hand pump or a small motor.

盖上果酱瓶! 要不准得招黄蜂.
Cover the jam! It's sure to invite the wasps.

该独裁者发布命令，将其生日定为公众假期。
The dictator decreed that his birthday would be a public holiday.

他们对财富[致富]无大欲望.
They had little desire for wealth/to get rich.

因经济衰退状况终止有望，股票价格得以保持高位。
Share prices were buoyed up by hopes of an end to the recession.

德语中有三性: 阳性、 阴性和中性.
There are three genders in German: masculine, feminine and neuter.

野禽，猎鸟一种野生的猎鸟，如野鸭、野鹅或鹌鹑
A wild game bird, such as a duck, goose, or quail.

汽车型号，汽车牌子制成品的型号或牌子，尤指汽车
A model or brand of a manufactured product, especially an automobile.

总之，唯有当严刑峻罚加之于违法之徒时，才能维持社会安定。
To sum up, only when strict punishment can be imposed on the lawless, can social stability be maintained.

秋天树叶由绿色变成黄褐色。
In autumn the leaves change from green to brown.

这沙土地利於排水, 适於种植块根作物.
This gravelly soil is well drained and good for growing root crops.

总有一天我会回到家乡。
I can come back to my hometown some day.

设法用钱大方一点。
Try to be more generous with your money.

这位老人气得发抖。
The old man quivered with rage.

这个岛难得有船停靠.
The island is seldom, if ever, visited by ships.

一月份生产率达到最高点。
Productivity peaked in January.

这是一种抽象物。
This is a kind of abstraction.

石块朝四面八方乱飞。
Stones were flying about in every direction.

信号响时，人人脱帽致敬。
Everyone uncovered when the signal sounded.

【谚】人倒众人踩。
If a man once fall, all will tread on him.

女王正对加拿大进行私人访问.
The Queen is making a private visit to Canada.

宽为80厘米.
The width measurement is 80 cm.

修筑一条铁路要花费许多劳动力。
It takes a lot of labor to build a railway.

撤哈拉大部分地区终年无雨。
Most of Sahara receives almost no rain at all.

宇宙之大令人吃惊.
Distancesin space are quite mind-boggling.

这些花因缺水而渐渐枯萎。
The flowers are wilting for lack of water.

那场战争中很多士兵死于那片沼泽地。
In that war, many soldiers died in that fen area.

这些商品大量供应。
These goods are freely available.

食物中有一些杂质。
There are some impurities in food.

窗台上积了灰尘.
Dust had collected on the window-sill.

某些植物具有药物效用.
Certain plants have medicinal (ie healing) properties.

及时补一针，省得补九针。
A stitch in time saves nine.

无通行证者不得入内.
There is no admittance without a pass.

大雨之后常有彩虹。
A rainbow is usually seen after a heavy rain.

该商行於八月份公布会计帐目.
The firm publishes its accounts in August.

晚9时把犯人锁进牢房过夜.
At 9 pm the prisoners are locked in for the night.

绝大部分党员对极端分子不予理睬.
The lunatic fringe is/are ignored by most members of the party.

他们接受该计画时心怀不满.
Therewas an undercurrent of resentment in their acceptance of the plan.

军人应当绝对服从命令。
Soldiers are expected to obey their orders without question.

需刷牙以去除牙斑.
It is necessary to remove plaque by brushing one's teeth.

酸能刺激胃黏膜.
Acid irritates the stomach lining.

时刻尤指关键时刻，危急关头
A point in time, especially a critical point.

鲸鱼被鱼叉射中後潜入水中.
The whale dived as the harpoon struck it.

勿孤注一掷。
Don't put all your eggs in one basket.

解毒剂一种药物复合剂，以前用于解毒
A medicinal compound formerly used as an antidote for poison.

冬季贸易不景气.
Trade is slack in winter.

蟹肉三明治；豆腐三明治
A crab burger, a tofu burger.

此案已由上诉法庭转给下级法庭处理.
The case has been remitted from the appeal court to a lesser tribunal.

几经失败之后，敌军被迫后撤。
After several reverses the enemy was forced to retreat.

石油市场欣欣向荣。
The oil market is enjoying a boom.

超级市场销售各种货物。
The supermarket sells goods of all descriptions.

行动胜于空谈。
Actions speak louder than words.

那辆货车遭罢工者抵制而无法卸货.
The lorry had been blacked by strikers and could not be unloaded.

希腊位于欧洲南部。
Greece is located in the south of Europe.

拮据极度缺乏或贫穷；贫困
Extreme want or poverty; destitution.

工会正酝酿著闹事.
Trouble is brewing in the trade unions.

石油钻塔现全面开工.
The oil rig is now fully operative.

蜜蜂采蜜时常使花受粉.
Flowers are often fertilized by bees as they gather nectar.

消息若泄露, 必将有後患.
If the news gets out there'll be trouble.

傍晚时地面变凉。
The ground cools off toward evening.

此合同无效.
This contract is null and void.

【谚】夫善则妻贤。
A good husband makes a good wife.

女王将亲自授予礼品.
The Queen will make the presentation (ie will hand over the gift) herself.

总共5.40英镑.
That's 5.40 in all.

物价渐趋稳定.
Prices are steadying.

特命全权公使派驻国外使馆的特命全权使节，仅低于大使
A minister plenipotentiary assigned to a foreign embassy, ranking next below the ambassador.

翼剖面；机翼；翼面一个部件或平面，如机翼、螺旋桨叶、方向舵等，其形状或方位控制稳定性、方向、抬升、冲击或驱动
A part or surface, such as a wing, propeller blade, or rudder, whose shape and orientation control stability, direction, lift, thrust, or propulsion.

把整块菜地按两锹深翻挖一遍.
Dig the whole vegetable plot two spits deep.

修建这堵高墙作为屏障以防外人闯入.
The high wall was built as a defence against intruders.

容积，体积大小、体积或容积，常指很大时
Size, mass, or volume, especially when very large.

美元突然贬值, 财经专家无不大伤脑筋.
The sudden fall in the value of the dollar has puzzled financial experts.

危险: 叶片旋转, 注意安全.
Danger: rotating blades.

这篇报道不是颠倒黑白就是含糊其辞.
The report was full of lies and prevarications.

从长远看, 物价肯定要涨.
In the long run pricesare bound to rise.

水流经水闸时十分湍急.
Water went rushing through the lock gates.

这些收音机制造厂产品打不开销路.
The producers of the radios could not find a market for them.

无通行证者不得擅入军事基地.
You cannot enter a military base without a permit.

他们燃起篝火防止野兽接近.
They lit a fire to keep wild animals off.

用意虽好, 考虑欠周.
It was thoughtless if well-meaning.

他们因资源短缺处境窘迫.
They were handicapped by (a) poverty of resources.

该油漆以粉制品形式出售.
The paint is sold in powdered form.

怀特霍尔街上流传著谣言.
Rumours are circulating in Whitehall.

音响效果经预录後已加入对话中.
The sound effects had been pre-recorded and were added to the dialogue.

这列火车是否直达伦敦？
Does this train go right through to London?

Lou Gehrig played first base.

士兵们背起行装，继续前进。
The soldiers shouldered their kit and moved on.

倘若没有指南针, 可利用星辰引路.
If you haven't a compass, use the stars to guide you.

请问我该先买哪个品种。
Please advise me which item I should buy.

这种胶水粘不住.
This glue doesn't stick very well.

一行人分乘三部车子。
The party separated into three cars.

地震之后紧跟着就是瘟疫。
Plague came in the wake of earthquake.

他们有没有投标争取承包合同？
Have they put in a bid for the contract?

这种衣料经得住反复洗涤。
This dress material will withstand repeated washing.

这些玉米秧正茁壮生长。
These corn plants are very vigorous.

刘厂长主持会议，宣布开会。
Director Liu, in the chair, opened the meeting.

人们抢著购买股票.
People rushed to buy the shares.

Offers of help are coming in thick and fast.

这台机器日夜运转.
This machine operates night and day.

Do not cut down the tree that gives you shade.

醋中含有醋酸.
Vinegar contains acetic acid.

股票按超出票面价值出售。
Shares are selling at a premium.

人们陆续进入教堂.
The procession moved into the church.

四个士兵守卫灵柩.
Four soldiers stood guard over the coffin.

钝剪刀剪不齐.
Blunt scissors don't cut cleanly.

土豆每磅20便士.
Potatoes are 20 pence a pound.

备有目录供索取.
Catalogues are available on request.

这辆汽车操纵灵敏.
The car responds well to the controls.

导弹已偏离轨道.
The missile deflected from its trajectory.

The king was crowned with great pomp.

发愁於事无补.
Fretting about it won't help.

The assembly of cars is often done by machines.

警方劝嫌疑犯招供.
The police persuaded the suspect to talk.

After a period of rapid inflation, price have now reach a plateau.

该金属已锈蚀.
The metal has corroded (away) because of rust.

皮革受潮可变质.
Leather can deteriorate in damp conditions.

The moth quivered its wings.

The new sports model achieved 100 miles an hour in road tests.

反对党已对议案提出几项修正.
The Opposition have tabled several amendments to the bill.

暮色四合, 渐而一片漆黑.
Twilight merged into total darkness.

火灾过後, 寒舍所剩无几.
After the fire, very little remained of my house.

If the fire-alarm goes, staff should assemble outside the building.

Subtle lighting helps people relax.

The Queen conferred knighthood on several distinguished men.

由於乾旱, 农作物歉收.
The crops failed because of drought.

Discharge or waste, such as pus or feces, from a living organism.

Their old rivalry soon surfaced when they met again.

After a period of rapid inflation, prices have now reached a plateau.

The soldiers were ordered to present arms.

无疑这是真相。
This is beyond doubt the truth.

The ceremony was something like a christening.

疼痛越来越剧烈。
The pain increased in intensity.

The speaker came to the point straight away.

The girl is all the more beautiful in her wedding gown.

Don't loiter your time away.

The tomatoes have cropped well this year.

悲哀不招自来。

A meager monetary allowance, wage, or remuneration.

哦，实际上没什么。
Oh, nothing to it, actually.

教义问答法常用于宗教教学。
The catechism is used for religious instruction.

No bees, no honey; no work, no money.

The gold lies deep in the earth.

Gift blind the eyes.

The five-star red flag is fluttering in the wind.

The seasons follow each other in rotation.

The government intends to go ahead with its privatization plans.

The tuition and fees fall heavy on the international students.

他们并非同宗。
They are not of the same blood.

The defendant is accused of theft.

The Queen conferred knighthoods on several distinguished men.

＜大学英语词汇综合测试题＞。
Practice Tests For College English Vocabulary""

已达成和解.
An amicable settlement was reached.

千方百计振兴渔业注定徒劳无功.
All attempts to revive the fishing industry were foredoomed to failure.

商品交易兴旺.
Trading in commodities was brisk.

消毒剂灭杀细菌。
Disinfectant kills germs.

步兵防守甚佳。
The infantry are defending well.

我绝不同极端分子来往[与极端主义格格不入].
I'll have no truck with extremists/extremism.

19世纪末, 英国许多政客鼓吹扩张主义.
Expansionism was advocated by many British politicians in the late 19th century.

联合王国包括英格兰、 威尔士、 苏格兰、 北爱尔兰.
The United Kingdom takes in England, Wales, Scotland and Northern Ireland.

没有人能想像出全面核子战争的後果.
Nobody can envisage the consequences of total nuclear war.

那条鲸鱼不住地用尾巴击水.
The whale thrashed the water with its tail.

一个上尉指挥一个连队或炮兵连。
A captain commands a company or battery.

对于他们枪杀无辜平民，人们感到义愤填膺。
People are indignant by their shooting of innocent civilians.

十二宫图用于占星术中预测未来。
The zodiac is used in astrology to predict the future.

希罗宁姆斯·博希是怪诞派绘画大师。
Hieronymus Bosch was a master of the grotesque in painting.

政府援引国家机密保密法以禁该书.
The government has invoked the Official Secrets Act in having the book banned.

全市居民倾城而出迎接凯旋球队.
The city turned out to welcome back its victorious team.

The Russians made a clean sweep of (the medals in) the gymnastics events.

请别为此过于不快。
Please don't take it too hard.

人们崇敬这位圣人。
The people revered the saint.

这地微向南面倾斜。
The land dips gently to the south.

旧房大都潮湿.
Old houses are often damp.

务必抽空来坐坐.
Do come round and see us some time.

海明威常用第一人称写作。
Hemingway often writes in the first person.

内阁定期开会.
The Cabinet meets regularly.

地面缓缓向南倾斜。
The land dips gently to the south.

那座宫殿灯火辉煌.
The palace was ablaze with lights.

城里谣言四起.
Rumours swept through the town.

整天断断续续地下著雨。
It rained on and off all day.

Guards were stationed around the prison.

将军下令部下攻城。
The general commanded his men to attack the city.

Never do things by halves.

比利时被称作欧洲战场。
Belgium has been called the cockpit of Europe.

Ivy crept along the walls.

今年豆子丰收.
The beans cropped well this year.

地质学书籍或论著
A book on geology.

They attempted to eradicate crime.

Having been placed; located.

Fruit trees; fruit growers.

人间若有天堂, 非此莫属!
If there's a heaven on earth, this is it!

The device will be in production by the end of the year.

Oranges contain vitamin C.

Swords brandished and banners waved.

The rebels were forced to give in.

A leader or commander; a chief.

金额共计230美元。
The sum came to 230 dollars.

The authorities put a price on the outlaw's head.

Scratching exacerbates a skin rash.

Cold winds swept the plains.

步兵防守甚佳.

The fans rushed onto the pitch in an excited mob.

那些男孩子们渴望下课。
The boys were itching for the lesson to end.

他们说那样的话真是可恶。
It's wicked of them to say such things.

那个裁判偏向那个队。
The umpire showed partiality for that team.

那个流氓靠行骗为生。
The rascal lives on the credulity of the people.

他们渴望返回家园.
They were pining to return home.

他们相爱逐年加深.
Yearby year their affection for each other grew stronger.

指定，指明指有；标明，指出
The act of designating; a marking or pointing out.

池塘四周耸立着一圈树木。
A fringe of trees stood round the pool.

按这个按钮开动引擎。
Press this button to start the engine.

轮船沉没于波涛下面。
The ship sank beneath the waves.

那些囚犯获赦释放.
The convicts were pardoned and set free.

蒸汽冷却时凝结成水。
Steam condenses into water when cooling down.

河岸决堤後, 田地遭洪水淹没.
When the river burst its banks the fields were inundated.

因矿井已关闭, 镇上一片死气沉沉.
The town is dead now the mine has closed.

当局已采取措施防止偷税漏税。
The authorities took measures to prevent tax fraud.

炮火掩护步兵前进.
Artillery gave cover (ie fired at the enemy to stop them firing back) while the infantry advanced.

陪审团认定该囚犯无罪。
The jury found the prisoner not guilty.

外面飓风呼啸著.
The hurricane screamed outside.

坦克陷入泥沼之中.
The tank (got) bogged down in the mud.

讲课时不要岔开（主题）.
